text: The sparkling society of the Doria Palace, the flattery of Orsini's obsession, the thwarted ambitions of her restless spirit, all threw into sharp relief the contrast of her grey life with the splendid one that filled her dreams. At the Villa Montalto she felt an alien, and although she had repeatedly urged Francesco to give her a separate establishment, he invariably pleaded his financial dependence on his uncle, who had built the villa for his family.
handwritten_text: The sparkling society of the Doria Palace, the flattery of Orsini's obsession, the thwarted ambitions of her restless spirit, all threw into sharp relief the contrast of her grey life with the splendid one that filled her dreams.
